interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Eggplant Clearing Cleansing Oil Pad 60 pads, Makeup remover pad. Exfoliating. Simple easy quick wipe. Moisturizing cleansing oil pad
Review Date: 2021/12/05
Store: PAPA RECIPE RIGHT FOR SKIN
Average Rating: 4.4
Product Details: {'Brand': 'PAPA RECIPE RIGHT FOR SKIN', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '3.98 x 3.82 x 2.72 inches; 10.86 Ounces'}
Review Text: Love these cleansing pads. I typically use fragrance free body oil to remove eye makeup, but was happy to see same thing in a pad. I was worried it would irritate the eyes, but it didn't! I used one pad for both eyes to remove waterproof mascara and eyeliner. No irritation and it took everything off! Definitely recommend!
Review Title: Removes stubborn makeup, even waterproof mascara!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Nu-pore Hydrocolloid Pimple Patch - Blemish Patches to care for Blemish Control, scar prevention, must haves tools for skincare. korean makeup trusted cosmetics secret k-beauty. 60 Patches
nu-pore
{'Brand': 'Nu-pore', 'Item Form': 'Patch', 'Product Benefits': 'Blemish Control', 'Scent': 'Hydrocolloid', 'Skin Type': 'Acne Prone', 'Product Dimensions': '5 x 3 x 3 inches; 1.2 Ounces', 'UPC': '780707702413'}
I tend to breakout a lot especially week prior to menstrual period. These pimple patches do a great job in minimizing pimple size and inflammation. I put it on at night before bed and when I wake up in the morning, the pimple is almost gone. It has good adhesion, mine did not come off during sleep. I definitely recommend.
Helps minimize inflammation

profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

**Skincare Preferences:** The user maintains a strong focus on managing acne and blemish control, sought after effective solutions for skin concerns related to breakouts. Their interest extends to products that aid in makeup removal without irritation and that prevent scarring while reducing inflammation.

**Treatment Methods:** This user continues to prefer topical solutions, especially convenient options like cleansing pads that simplify their skincare routine. They look for products that integrate easily into their regimen and deliver visible results quickly.

**Product Characteristics:** The user values good adhesion and usability in skincare products, favoring those that are low maintenance and effective. Their recent experience indicates a positive reception to gentle yet effective cleansing methods that accommodate sensitive skin, enhancing their existing night routine.

**Purchase Behavior:** The user leans towards K-beauty products, reflecting an interest in trends and reputable brands. They exhibit discernment in their choices, shown by high ratings and detailed feedback provided.

**Overall Trends:** The user shows consistency in their pursuit of acne-focused solutions while exploring innovative product formats like cleansing pads. They value efficiency, convenience, and product reliability, signaling a tendency to incorporate multi-functional products into their skincare regimen.
